channel.title: Help with spells
channel.description: Any mod/admin/owner spells anyone likes alot more than others? if you do a link to a tut for it or code or something, thanks :).

item.title: Help with spells
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:16, topic:158598”]in case 131, under,

[code] int npcIndex = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int magicID = inStream.readSignedWordA();
println_debug("npcIndex: “+npcIndex+” magicID: "+magicID);
//setAnimation(711);
int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absX;
int EnemyY2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absY;
int EnemyHP2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].HP;
if(EnemyX2 != absX && EnemyY2 != absY)
faceNPC(npcIndex);

            boolean Cant = false;[/code]

Please guys, just pm each other, keep the fighting off the threads.[/quote]

Agreed, Im leaving this topic, This idiot just got 0wn3d anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spells
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

youknowho:

Does help have anything to do with help wiht admin/mod spells…hm…lets see, maybe the need of help…hm who knows. and your flamming. suppose to only post help. your not a mod.

L2Read , L2Understand Rules (It says "Do not post topics with Help me, IT doesn’t say, Don’t post “Help me” Subject Unless Help means Help with admin spells Which last time i checked it doesn’t? )

Also, Help me could mean loads of different things, For all the people who couldn’t care helping you in this topic might think you need help with compiling and that your a total noob.

And i no im not a mod, Theres no way in hell im going to even come close to mod, But if i was this topic would be locked and removed as soon as you posted it.

P.S , Thank you for changing that stupid subject title, Have a nice day.

item.title: Help with spells
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

  1. Be meaningful in your topic
    Your topic title must have something to do with your problem, do not just add ‘HEEEEELP ME’, and try to be as descriptive as you can. Also try reading the FAQs or the tutorial forums before you post a thread.

Does {LIEK OMG HELP} {HELP OMG LIEK} Lolz. help plz.

Have anything to do with :

youknowho:

Any mod/admin/owner spells anyone likes alot more than others? if you do a link to a tut for it or code or something, thanks :).

Now, You reported me for no reason www.youfail.org , Not please stop trying to act big.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spells
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (magicID == 1158 && playerLevel[3] >= 80) { // Fire Strike - now Shock Wave ProjectileSpell(448, 100, 481, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 30, 1, 566, 558, 554, 1, 1, 3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(453, 30, 4); attackPlayersWithin(453, 30, 4); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); }

Seems to be pretty good spell.

You can change how much it hits by changing the

hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);

Notice the “5” and the “25” the increase the amount of the 5 and the 25.

Mistake me if im wrong, but the the 25 is the max you can hit, so you can make it to like… 150
and the max you can it with it is a 150.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spells
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“kupo, post:2, topic:158598”]I know one that I really like the code looks like this-

SPELL JUNK { disconnected = true; sendMessage("learn to make your own"); }[/quote]

Fail, Spell Junk isn’t defined as anything, so it would have to be something like void junkyspell() {

Also, the sendmessage wouldn’t work because you’d be disconnected… Try something like this…

void lul() { disconnected = true; System.out.println("Make your own, dude"); }

Read full topic
